tweets.text:
@JaneHawkins987 @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @MattHancock @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids You think @EnvAgency will now take it seriously?
Sit back and watch them fob off the Secretary of State, just like they do the rest of us.
We have assessed the capping works at Walley's Quarry and have made clear further actions to manage odours. Please see our statement. https://t.co/NcqGMajjYd

We finally cleared the enormous rubbish pile from the River Douglas! 
Incredible teamwork @stormwater_jo @Mike_Forty @VitaminSNC @DouglasPilot @RibbleTrust @WiganCouncil @CanalRiverTrust @EnvAgencyNW 
Before and after photos https://t.co/Mo59VFOzlI

Both Bitts Park Car Park and the Swifts Car Park in #Carlisle have reopened to customers.

They were temporarily closed to allow work to be undertaken by the @EnvAgency https://t.co/NULc5qGVUO
@JamesA_1234 @Samanth33412592 @EnvAgencyMids Yes, funny that.  @ClareDinnisEA #StopTheStink.

tweets.text:
@AaronBell4NUL @Samanth33412592 @MattHancock @EnvAgency Thank you @MattHancock The @EnvAgency report was appalling in it's lack of concrete resolutions & lacked any empathy for the residents of Newcastle. @JamesBevanEA this is not good enough & we're still suffering more than ever. Thank you too @AaronBell4NUL 

@StinkStopthe
@Cap_it_off @ClareDinnisEA I think it's time to update our press coverers and let them know that @EnvAgencyMids are doing nothing .
@EnvAgencyMids What a load of rubbish! Stinks worse than ever and they are still tipping ü§¨
@EnvAgencyMids Just a joke you are money pays once again
@EnvAgencyMids, that‚Äôs looking pretty good, the next steps are quite prescriptive too which is promising. Another step closer to #StopTheStink https://t.co/0sc0y59xDX

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy
@EnvAgencyMids Jesus, you lot must be on some serious backhanders.
@EnvAgencyMids This stinks more than the landfill! Hang your heads in shame.

tweets.text: @TonyShe54 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off I think it's time for us to act now as @EnvAgencyMids are even more useless than a chocolate teapot !

@ollyandpatch @SianieRoo @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK That's another thing that distresses me. I'm suffering from the poisonous gases and odour but thankfully do not have any respiratory conditions. My heart bleeds for those who are even more negatively and seriously impacted. I hope we can all be relieved of this nightmare soon.
@StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Is that new waste there that they are dumping? Thought they have suspended new waste.

@davemh72 @ollyandpatch @HelenVi00175623 @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK I've also experienced an increase in headaches and migraines as a result of the noxious gases and odours caused by Walley's Quarry. What needs to happen for our pleas to be heard and taken seriously?

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Since when does the @EnvAgency have jurisdiction over protected species? Isn‚Äôt it @NaturalEngland responsibility to issue permits and liscences? Not that that government agency is any more competent or caring.
@EnvAgencyMids The Environment Agency is a joke there is no difference what so ever! in fact the last 48 hours have been worse than it has in months!

2. The EA is not doing enough
3. Red Industries are corrupt
4. The residents deserve better

tweets.text: More destruction of nature?@EnvAgency Birds are breeding at the Lower Otter Restoration Project! #HS2 They are supposed to be protected! @GreenJennyJones @CarolineLucas @ZacGoldsmith https://t.co/LrFVhWMohv
@SimmoBurgess @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids And it took 5 days to publish it .

@EnvAgencyMids So cells 3/4 are higher levels of emulsions yet they are already dumping in cell 3 and have been for weeks, why say covering cell 1 would help if other cells are already a problem? It‚Äôs been just as bad since. evidence based? Why is the evidence from 1000‚Äôs of people not enough?

@EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA Why was Adam Share ever given permission to be CEO of a landfill company? Criminal past for hacking your agency, yet you allow him to be in charge of this? Something doesn't fit here. https://t.co/MyHTVpo4ap
I am hearing that @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest may have finally seen sense!? @ChrisGPackham @Natures_Voice @DevonWildlife https://t.co/fAB6uuBlCW
@EnvAgencyMids Excuse me - it STILL STINKS
@EnvAgencyMids Not good enough!!

@EnvAgencyMids Judging from the odour in Hartshill (over 2 miles) away, Friday night, last night and all day today they have failed. Our children's school and our home has been full of the stench. #notgoodenough @envAgencyMids #stopthestink
@EnvAgencyMids I've got a fact for you. It still stinks!
@Samanth33412592 @EnvAgencyMids We are a brown-envelope based organisation

@a_merrydew @SianieRoo @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK Seems wrong clicking the 'like' button. My wife has always been a part time asthmatic but the last month its inhaler after inhaler. !!! Get better soon.

@SianieRoo @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK I've just vomited in the kitchen. I've had an increase in headaches, migraines, and sleep deprivation, but I've never vomited because of the odour before üòî What a way to start the work day üëç Positive news can't come soon enough.
